commands.name: az storage directory create
commands.summary: Create a new directory under the specified share or parent directory.
commands.syntax:
az storage directory create --name
                            --share-name
                            [--account-key]
                            [--account-name]
                            [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                            [--backup-intent]
                            [--connection-string]
                            [--disallow-trailing-dot {false, true}]
                            [--fail-on-exist]
                            [--file-endpoint]
                            [--metadata]
                            [--sas-token]
                            [--snapshot]
                            [--timeout]

commands.name: az storage directory create

commands.name: az storage directory delete
commands.syntax:
az storage directory delete --name

                            [--fail-not-exist]
                            [--file-endpoint]
                            [--sas-token]
                            [--snapshot]
                            [--timeout]

commands.name: az storage directory exists
commands.summary: Check for the existence of a storage directory.
commands.syntax:
az storage directory exists --name
                            --share-name
                            [--account-key]
                            [--account-name]
                            [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                            [--backup-intent]
                            [--connection-string]
                            [--disallow-trailing-dot {false, true}]
                            [--file-endpoint]
                            [--sas-token]
                            [--snapshot]
                            [--timeout]
examples: az storage directory exists --account-key 00000000 --account-name MyAccount --name MyDirectory --share-name MyShare

commands.name: az storage directory list
commands.syntax:
az storage directory list --share-name
                          [--account-key]
                          [--account-name]
                          [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                          [--backup-intent]
                          [--connection-string]
                          [--disallow-trailing-dot {false, true}]
                          [--exclude-extended-info]
                          [--file-endpoint]
                          [--name]
                          [--sas-token]
                          [--timeout]
examples: az storage directory list --account-key 00000000 --account-name MyAccount --share-name MyShare

                          [--disallow-trailing-dot {false, true}]
                          [--exclude-extended-info]
                          [--name]
                          [--sas-token]
                          [--timeout]
examples: az storage directory list --account-key 00000000 --account-name MyAccount --share-name MyShare

commands.name: az storage directory show
commands.summary: Get all user-defined metadata and system properties for the specified directory.
commands.syntax:
az storage directory show --name
                          --share-name
                          [--account-key]
                          [--account-name]
                          [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                          [--backup-intent]
                          [--connection-string]
                          [--disallow-trailing-dot {false, true}]
                          [--file-endpoint]
                          [--sas-token]
                          [--snapshot]
                          [--timeout]
